A4.text: The Three Rings were hidden by the Elves Gil-galad, CÃ­rdan, and Galadriel.

A5.text: Sauron then secretly forged the One Ring to rule all the others.

A6.text: The One Ring was forged by the Dark Lord Sauron during the Second Age to gain dominion over the free peoples of Middle-earth.

A7.text: Gandalf refused to wield the One Ring out of the knowledge that he would become like Sauron himself.
